con:config.con:query: DELETE FROM `user` WHERE `username` LIKE '%kamabizbazti.com%' OR `username` = 'a@bc' OR `username` = '${#TestSuite#MaxEmail}'

con:configuration.scriptText: import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder String lowerCaseEmail = messageExchange.modelItem.testStep.testCase.testSuite.getPropertyValue( "MixedEmail" ) def holder = new XmlHolder( messageExchange.responseContentAsXml ) assert holder["//Results/ResultSet/Row/USER.USERNAME/text()"] == lowerCaseEmail.toLowerCase()
